name: 2021 8th International Conference on Soft Computing & Machine Intelligence
content: For papers submitted to ISCMI 2021, we offer the publication as following: 1\. Publication in Conference Proceedings. All submissions will be peer reviewed, and all accepted papers will be published in ISCMI 2021 conference proceedings which are expected to be included in IEEE Xplore and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, etc.
